Package view

Class TourView

java.lang.Object
view.TourView
public class TourView extends Object
TourView contains methods to draw a list of tours on the map.
Author:
H4114

  • Method Details

    • drawTour

      public void drawTour(IntersectionView intersectionView, RoadSegmentView roadSegmentView, CityMap cityMap, LinkedHashMap<Courier,Tour> listTours, Graphics2D g, double coefX, double coefY, double zoom, int sideLength, Point focus, boolean displayDeliveryRequests, Courier selectedCourier)
      Draws all the components of the list of tours.
      Parameters:
      intersectionView - The tool allowing to draw an intersection.
      roadSegmentView - The tool allowing to draw a road segment.
      cityMap - The city map on which is drawn the tour.
      listTours - The tours to be drawn.
      g - The Graphics object to paint.
      coefX - x-coefficient to scale the tour.
      coefY - y-coefficient to scale the tour.
      zoom - Zoom level on the map.
      sideLength - Size of the square encompassing the city map.
      focus - Point that handles the position of the city map.
      displayDeliveryRequests - true if the delivery requests
      selectedCourier - The selected courier for whom their tour is to be displayed
